suite.name: Filter Comics

test.name: Listando comics de um personagem especifico

kw.name: GET
Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Status Code Retornado: ${ResponseComics.status_code} -- Status Code Esperado: ${expected_status}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Status Code Retornado: 200 -- Status Code Esperado: 200

test.name: Validando se houve retorno de comics apenas de um personagem

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Item
kw.doc: An item of ``key`` / ``value`` must be found in a ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Verificando se filtro retornou comics sobre o Wolverine
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

suite.doc: Filtra comics de um personagem especifico na API MARVEL
